section.title: Configuring alert notificationsAE_alert_rule_details_page
section.para: You can ensure that selected administrators get an automated email notification when a specific alert is triggered. You can also have notifications sent to the email address of a monitored mailbox for a help desk or other incident handling system.
You can specify the administrators who should receive notifications about the alert.

procedure.title: To add recipients to an alert notification list

step.para: Go to Settings > Alert Notifications, and then select an alert rule from the list.
On the Alert Settings page, under Recipients, select Add Recipient.
In the Add Recipients: Select Users window, select one or more administrators, and then press Add.
On the Alert Settings page, under Notification Method, select Email.
An Email notification contains full details about the alert.

procedure.title: To remove recipients from an alert notification list

step.para: Go to Settings > Alert Notifications, and then select an alert rule from the list.
On the Alert Settings page, go to the appropriate recipient, and press Remove.

note.para: To temporarily disable notifications for a particular recipient, clear the associated Email option.

section.para: You can add external email addresses of monitored mailboxes to create incidents in help desk or other incident handling system.

procedure.title: To add email addresses of monitored mailboxes

step.para: Go to Settings > Alert Notifications, and then select an alert rule from the list.
On the Alert Settings page, under Monitored Mailboxes, type the email address, and press Add.

procedure.title: To remove email addresses of monitored mailboxes

step.para: Go to Settings > Alert Notifications, and then select an alert rule from the list.
On the Alert Settings page, under Monitored Mailboxes, go to the email address, and press Remove.
